title: 3 and Out - Underdog Baker, Haslam Disaster, Picks vs. Players Debate, Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Underdog Baker, Haslam Disaster, Picks vs. Players Debate, Headlines, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to Baker Mayfield being named starter in Carolina, if he can resurrect his career in his favorite role of underdog, why Browns Owner Jimmy Haslam is making GM Andrew Berry’s job impossible, if the philosophical trend of GM's valuing players over draft picks will continue. He also touches on some top headlines, including Belichick’s non-player Football Mount Rushmore, and the controversial cut block that almost ended Kayvon Thibodeaux’s season. Finally, he answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
